  • Method Details

    • convert

      public static String convert(String number, int currentBase, int desiredBase)
      Converts a number from one base to another.
      Parameters:
      number - The number to convert, represented as a string.
      currentBase - The base of the given number.
      desiredBase - The base to convert to.
      Returns:
      The converted number as a string.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input number is invalid for the given base.

    • toDecimal

      static int toDecimal(String number, int base)
      Converts a number from a given base to decimal.
      Parameters:
      number - The number in the given base.
      base - The base of the given number.
      Returns:
      The decimal equivalent of the number.

    • fromDecimal

      public static String fromDecimal(int decimal, int base)
      Converts a decimal number to the specified base.
      Parameters:
      decimal - The decimal number to convert.
      base - The base to convert to.
      Returns:
      The number in the desired base as a string.

    • isValidInput

      private static boolean isValidInput(String number, int base)
      Validates whether the given number is valid for the specified base.
      Parameters:
      number - The number to validate.
      base - The base to check against.
      Returns:
      True if the number is valid for the base, false otherwise.
